ratings.comment: Dr. Butera is a great professor. She will make you work for your grade but will help support you along the way. She also encourages you to try your best. As long as you keep up with the homework and attend class, you will be fine.

Brianna is a very caring teacher. Super accessible outside of class, always answers emails and clarifies anything that you don't understand. She is a tough grader but offers help and explanation. Genuinely cares for and wants her students to succeed.
Really great teacher! Helps you learn the material and improve in the language.

If you're deciding between Brianna and any other teacher- TAKE BRIANNA ! She has been the best teacher I've had in all my years of school. She genuinely wants to see her students succeed and puts so much into what she does. Absolutely fantastic teacher and person in general. Please take her, you will love it. She makes me actually WANT to learn.

One of the best professors at UW. She truly cares for her students success. She is willing to help clarify and make sure concepts are understood. Puts a lot of thought into her daily lesson plans, making them fun. Would take another class with Brianna again!

I had Profe. Brianna for Spanish 204 as a freshman. I read amazing reviews on this website before I signed up for her class, which were all proven true when I took it. She is a fair grader and is always willing to go over exams individually. Not only does she reply to emails promptly, but she is great for students with accommodations.

Brianna has high expectations for all of her students. However, she is always there to ask questions and willing to help with anything. She is a great TA that takes the time to explain concepts. And while she is a semi-difficult grader, it only forces you to work harder. I would take her again without a doubt.

Brianna was my best Spanish teacher I've had, including high school. She really cared if you do well in the class and she is super helpful. She's super funny in class and she will explain something until you understand it. would definitely have her again!

Brianna is by far the best Spanish teacher I have had in my life. I would recommend her 100%. She clearly lays out exactly what will be on the test and how many points each section will be. I felt prepared for every exam. She made 7:45 class more bearable!!

Brianna is an amazing TA. She works really hard to make sure you understand the material. The tests are hard (and frequent), but if you study, you should have no problem getting a good grade in the class. Also, she is a very fair grader and usually sets aside a class to review before a test. Do yourself a favor and take a class with her!!

She is an amazing TA for spanish 204, she makes the transition easy for high school students taking their first college level spanish class. Yes, you have to work and study to do well in the class, but Brianna is a wonderful teacher. She is there to help the students out, not because she has to be there. She genuinely gets to know students too

The best spanish teacher I've ever had. She really cares about all of her students. Participation is very important, and if you put the work in you should do well in the class. Taking her 8:50 was not a chore at all, I actually looked forward to going everyday.

Brianna is a great professor but if you want to receive retro-credit for your Spanish class as a freshman, choose wisely. There are red marks on my exams whereas my other friends in 204 with different TA's, barely have any marks on their exams with similar answers to mine. Expect to read and morning sessions will kill you.

Profe Brianna works her ass off to make sure her students are engaged, well-prepared and learning.  She is such a good educator and takes her job very seriously (though she knows how to make class fun).  Her devotion brings the best out of her students and I'm glad I had the pleasure of being in her class!  By no means easy, but very fulfilling.

She makes my day, everyday. I wish I could just see her everyday. Best Spanish teacher I've ever had. Takes the class seriously and puts a lot of effort in preparing each lesson. Takes time to meet and get to know her students. Fair grader, fun class, great person. Recommend her 100%.
She was really great!  Her classes were usually pretty interested and she spent a lot of time on test preparation in comparison to other TA's.  Native English speaker making it a lot easier.
She is by far the best Spanish teacher I have ever had. Just learn the vocab on your own and her teaching does the rest.

She is a great! Very friendly and always willing to meet before or after class to help you. I had her at 7:45am and somehow she managed to be wide awake and happy everyday which made the early mornings much more tolerable. I highly recommend her.

She is one of the best spanish teachers that I have ever had!  She is such a charming person and so funny!  I love going to her class every morning!  She gets the material across very clearly and makes it easy to understand! She even goes out of her way to help you after/before class.  I highly recommend her!  iiiQue buena!!!
Best Spanish T.A. I have ever had. Try to take a class with her!

One of the best teachers I've ever had. EXTREMELY helpful and encouraging, and will go out of her way to make sure you understand. Very lively and funny person. I was always happy after leaving her class. She knows her stuff; I learned a TON. She is very flexible and fair, and cares about each individual in the class. Overall, AMAZING.
